column1: He is married and has two children.
Igor Volk was selected as a cosmonaut on July 30, 1980, flew as Research Cosmonaut on Soyuz T-12, the 7th expedition to Salyut 7.
He has previously served as President of the National Aero Club of Russia and Vice President of the Fdration Aronautique Internationale.
As recognition for his contributions as a test pilot and cosmonaut he was awarded the Hero of the Soviet Union on July 29, 1984.

column2: It consumes 11 litres (3 gallons) of fuel for every 100km (62mi) traveled and cruises at around 637km/h (396mph).
